Namespace: FileSystem

temtem.file. FileSystem

Not available in Web Reports Singleton created on application startup for use with interacting with the file system, it is a wrapper for ActiveXObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject").

There are two convenience functions provided by this class that are wrappers for functionality provided by FileSystemObject. There are a number of other methods available with FileSystemObject. Information regarding these functions can be found in the documentation for FileSystemObject

Source:
  • ../src/ADF/API/ADFAPI.js, line 1180
